entry.title: Ex-NATO chief lambasts Azerbaijanโs โillegalโ blockade of Nagorno-Karabakh

media:group.media:title: Ex-NATO chief lambasts Azerbaijanโs โillegalโ blockade of Nagorno-Karabakh
media:group.media:description:
The ethnic cleansing of Nagorno-Karabakhโs Armenians would be a โred lineโ for the West, said former NATO Secretary General Anders Fogh Rasmussen during a meeting with Armenian reporters and policy experts Monday, including CivilNet Editor-in-Chief Karen Harutyunyan. After holding high-level talks with Armeniaโs prime minister and other senior officials, Rasmussen visited the entrance of the Lachin corridor, the only overland route between Armenia and Nagorno-Karabakh, which Azerbaijan has blockaded for more than 90 days.

entry.title: Jack Youredjian: โGiving and serving others bring meaning to my lifeโ

media:group.media:title: Jack Youredjian: โGiving and serving others bring meaning to my lifeโ
media:group.media:description:
Jack (Hagop) Youredjian, in conversation with Lara Tcholakian, speaks about the importance of education and his life purpose to support efforts related to educational and social development programs. He shares his journey to professional success as an entrepreneur in pharmaceutical and medical supplies and discusses the qualities and values that he has inherited and that helped him succeed in all his corporate and community work endeavors. As a grandchild of Armenian genocide survivors, he explores the historical narratives that he recalls from his grandparents starting from his childhood in Jerusalem, and the role they played for him and his pursuit of happiness, success and a meaningful life.
About Jack Youredjian Jack (Hagop) Youredjian is Executive Chairperson of Western Drug/Lifeair. He earned his Doctor of Pharmacy from the University of Southern California after his initial studies at the American University of Beirut. He is also a philanthropist, and in 2019 he established a scholarship fund for COAF to support access to higher education for rural youth in Armenia. He also supports a number of other institutions, including the American University of Armenia and the Armenian Relief Society, among others.
Program overview In a new, open setting, Lara deconstructs inherited cultural and historical narratives, memories, life lessons and experiences from change catalysts. Her guests reflect on the stories, people, events and mindsets that have shaped their professional and personal lives, enabling them to create a more mindful life.

media:group.media:title: ีีฟีกีถีฃีกีพีธึ ีง, ีฅึีข ีพีกึีนีกีบีฅีฟีจ ีญีธีฝีธึีด ีง 5-ึีค ีทีกึีกีฝีตีกีถ ีดีกีฝีซีถ. ิฑึีดีซีถีฅ ีีกึีฃีกึีตีกีถ
media:group.media:description:
ีีฟีกีถีฃีกีพีธึ ีง, ีฅึีข ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีซ ีพีกึีนีกีบีฅีฟีจ ีญีธีฝีธึีด ีง ีขีกีถีกีฏีธึีด 5-ึีค ีทีกึีกีฝีตีกีถ ีฃีธึีฎีธึีถีฅีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีดีกีฝีซีถ` ีธึีบีฅีฝ ีบีกึีฟีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีบีกีฟีณีกีผ: ีีก ีบีกึีฆีธึีถีกีฏีกึีถีธึีด ีง ีบีกีฟีฅึีกีฆีดีธึีด ีบีกึีฟีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีญีธึึีกีตีซีถ ีบีกีฟีณีกีผีถีฅึีซ ีดีกีฝีซีถ ึีถีถีกึีฏีธึีดีถีฅึีจ ึ ีดีฉีกีฃีถีธึีด ีดีฅึ ีฆีฃีธีถีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ: ิฑีตีฝ ีฟีฅีฝีกีฏีฅีฟีถ ีง ีฐีกีตีฟีถีธึีด ีผีกีฆีดีกึีกีฒีกึีกีฏีกีถ ีฐีกึึีฅึีธีพ ึีธึีฑีกีฃีฅีฟ ิฑึีดีซีถีฅ ีีกึีฃีกึีตีกีถีจ ีีซีพีซีฌีีฅีฉีซ ิฑึีทีกีฌีธึีตีฝ ีีฒีคีฅีฝีตีกีถีซ ีฐีฅีฟ ีฆึีธึีตึีธึีด:
0:00 - ีีกึีนีกีบีฅีฟีจ ีญีธีฝีธึีด ีง ีฐีซีถีฃีฅึีธึีค ีทีกึีกีฝีตีกีถ ีดีกีฝีซีถ 3:39 - ิธีถีคีคีซีดีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถ ีซีทีญีกีถีธึีฉีตีกีถีถ ีง ีกีฝีธึีดี ีคีกีพีกีณีกีถ, ีซีทีญีกีถีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจี ีฆีซีถีพีธึีกีฏีกีถีถีฅึีซีถ 5:45 - ีีกึีนีกีบีฅีฟีซ ีฐีกีตีฟีกึีกึีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ ีพีฟีกีถีฃีกีพีธึ ีง 10:01 - ิปีีนีธีึ ีง ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีจ ีคีชีฃีธีฐีธึีด ีขึีตีธึีฝีฅีฌีตีกีถ ีฑึีกีนีกึีซึ 14:50 - ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีจ ีดีซีถีซีดีธึีดีซ ีง ีฐีกีฝึีถีธึีด ีิฑีิฟ-ีธึีด ีซึ ีดีกีฝีถีกีฏึีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ 19:20 - ีิฑีิฟ-ีซึ ีคีธึึีฝ ีฃีกีฌีธึึ ีฐีฅีฟีธ ีฐีกีตีฟีกึีกึีฅีฌ ีธีน ีขีฌีธีฏีกีตีซีถ ีฏีกึีฃีกีพีซีณีกีฏ 23:18 - ิฑีถีคึีฅีฝ ีีธีฃ ีีกีฝีดีธึีฝีฅีถีซี ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถ ีกีตึีซ ีถีบีกีฟีกีฏีถีฅึีจ 26:42 - ิฑีดีฅีถีกีพีฟีกีถีฃีกีพีธึ ีดีซีฟีธึีดีซ ีดีกีฝีซีถ

media:group.media:title: Connectivity, climate, cooperation: Exploring ADBโs work in Armenia
media:group.media:description:
Paolo Spantigati, country director for Armenia at the Asian Development Bank, sat down with CivilNetโs Mark Dovich to talk about ADBโs efforts to support the Armenian governmentโs growth and reform agendas. ADB is one of Armeniaโs largest multilateral development partners, having provided the country with financial assistance worth more than $1.6 billion since 2005.
0:00 What exactly does the Asian Development Bank do in Armenia? 4:00 How does ADB help improve Armeniaโs infrastructure and connectivity? 7:10 Whatโs the current state of Armeniaโs North-South Corridor project? 10:48 What can we expect from ADBโs 2024-2028 strategy plan for Armenia? 12:33 Why is a strong climate focus โdoubly importantโ for Armeniaโs development? 14:43 Where may Armeniaโs economy be heading this year?
